html:
Top Tracks Of The Week

RIVERS OF NIHIL, IGORRR, BLACKBRAID & More Added To Metal Injection's Top Tracks Of The Week

This week's top tracks include Metal Injection's Artist Of The Month Rivers of Nihil, a weird one from Igorrr, Blackbraid bringing the black metal, The Armed going way heavier, and more! Check out the playlist on Spotify here and on Apple Music here. The new additions this week are:

  1. "The Sub-Orbital Blues" – Rivers of Nihil
  2. "Blastbeat Falafel" – Igorrr feat. Trey Spruance & Timba Harris
  3. "Wardrums at Dawn on the Day of My Death" – Blackbraid
  4. "Well Made Play" – The Armed
  5. "In Devastation" – Sinsaenum
  6. "War Comes Again" – Unleashed
  7. "Violent Nature" – I Prevail
  8. "The Rot Beneath" – Grand Cadaver
